name: Clone Chaos (FinalAct)
description:
STEAL THE CARROTS AND AVOID THE ANGRY TRUCK THAT IS TRYING TO RUN YOU OVER

BUNNY LIST :

=  WHITE BUNNY : NORMAL SPEED AND NORMAL SCORE MULTIPLIER

= PINK BUNNY : INSANE SPEED AND LOW SCORE MULTIPLIER

= GOLDEN BUNNY : LOW SPEED AND HIGH SCORE MULTIPLIER

[IMPORTANT} INSTRUCTIONS HOW TO PLAY : = W/A/S/D FOR MOVEMENT = E TO SWITCH BUNNYS = C TO COOLECT CARROTS
